text: right The Circle and M.E.T.E. is a 1983 role-playing game supplement published by Hero Games for Champions. ==Contents== The Circle and M.E.T.E. is the first in a series of play aids for Champions, which outline organizations that superhero player characters can interact with. ==Reception== William A. Barton reviewed The Circle and M.E.T.E. in The Space Gamer No. 72. Barton commented that "If the succeeding books in the Organization series are as good as this one, Hero Games should have some winners on its hands." ==Reviews== * Different Worlds #40 (July/Aug., 1985) ==References== Category:Champions supplements
title: The Circle and M.E.T.E.
